subject: AIPO GitHub Access and Usage Reminder

content.summary: Reminder to access the existing AIPO system from GitHub rather than rebuilding it
content.details: Lloyd, I've noticed you've been trying to rebuild the AIPO system. The AIPO is already implemented and ready to use. Please clone the AIPO repository from GitHub and use the existing implementation. Refer to KRA-20250427-LloydAIPOGitHubAccess.md for detailed instructions on how to access and use the existing AIPO system from GitHub. The guide includes step-by-step instructions for cloning the repository, initializing submodules, and using the AIPO components.
